actions.text: Referred to Joint Committee on Atomic Energy.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Atomic Energy Commission in consultation with the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency to enter into cooperative agreements with certain States to contain and render harmless uranium mill tailings.

summary.text: Authorizes the Atomic Energy Commission in consultation with the United States Environmental Protection Agency to enter into cooperative agreements with the States of New Mexico, Colorado, Texas, Arizona, Oregon, Utah, and Wyoming to contain and render harmless uranium mill tailings.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Atomic Energy Commission in consultation with the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency to enter into cooperative agreements with certain States to contain and render harmless uranium mill tailings.
